>
[Reason Rapidly](/Feats.aspx?ID=1472) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=318" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 64 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your mind works through clues at an unbelievable speed. You instantly use up to five [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) actions. If you have any special abilities or free actions that would normally be triggered when you Recall Knowledge, you can't use them for these actions.
